oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Colletotrichum acutatum: survival in plant debris and infection on alternate hosts
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Parikka, Päivi
Pääskynkivi, Eila
Lemmetty, Anne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The survival of Colletotrichum acutatum in infected plant material was studied in two trials: one in 2002-2003 and another in 2003-2005 with artificially infected strawberry leaves, crowns and berries.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Parikka, Päivi; Pääskynkivi, Eila and Lemmetty, Anne (2006) Colletotrichum acutatum: survival in plant debris and infection on alternate hosts. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 2 (10), p. 37.
